customer_reviews.title: A must-have Accessory for the Drone Pilot
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product. I'd say a "must have" accessory for the Drone Pilot. Provides a nice clean surface from which to launch and recover your drone. It keeps dirt and debris from blowing back onto your Drone. Keeps the gritty dirt out of your motor and dusting your camera lens. Nice weight to it so that it doesn't blow away or flap around when taking off or landing. Also lets others around you know where you are taking off and landing which in turn keeps them a safe distance. Folds up nicely and has its own carry-bag.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Easy, no dust!
customer_reviews.text: The fact that you just toss to this larger pad to a location you want it at, place your done and you're ready to go. I use this on dusty/dry land. When I drop this, the cable ring has enough weight to toss up a bit of dust away from the pad. I don't have to use any pegs to hold this in place. This is big enough to were you can still see it while at 300+ feet via the drone camera. This is a great land pad!

product_meta.title: Hoodman HDLP3 Drone Landing Pad Launch Accessory 3 Foot Diameter Fits DJI Phantom Size Smaller RC Quadcopter
product_meta.description: The Hoodman HDLP3 Drone Landing Pad is a great accessory investment for your DJI Phantom and smaller RC Quadcopter adventure video endeavors. A Hoodman launch pad will keep your lens clean throughout takeoff and landing. Nothing worse than mowing the lawn with your rotors. Your launch pad will protect your rotors from tall grass and pebble strikes. Your first sandy beach takeoff and landing will pull sand through your motor bearings and blast your lens and gimbal with sand. Deploy the Hoodman landing/launch pad in seconds as it springs out of its compact 13 inch carry bag. No need to carry a hammer and stakes to keep your pad in place; Hoodman launch pads have weighted perimeters and stay put on the windiest of days. Safely and clearly mark your next takeoff and landing area with a Hoodman launch pad. Hoodman has been a trusted name in rugged, drone, camera and video accessories for over 33 years and offers a 1 year warranty: free from manufacturing defects.
feature_bullets: Easy set up springs into shape when released from 13 inch carry bag
3.2 pound zinc coated perimeter cable keeps drone launch pad in place without stakes
Keeps your camera lens clean during launch and landing
Protects rotors from tall grass and pebble strikes
Rustproof components clean up with a wet towel
